MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in WA4 postcode area of Warrington, affecting properties in Flers Avenue and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  3:13PM. Our engineers have arrived  on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:45PM on 10th January 2021
